page.title: 20Stansted Airport Opinions
page.content:
The inhabitants of{Churchgate street} and{Matching Tye}were sent a question- aire asking whether or not they agreed with the {Government's}plans to expand {Stansted Airport.}Results are below.
{Mat Tye} Ch/gate {Total}
Agree {26} 15 {41} Disagree { 6 } 9 {15} Don't know { 3 } 3 { 6 TOTAL { 35} 27 {62 { Seven of those who disagreed had been living in the area for less than 15 years.
Ten of those who agreed added comments to the questionaire about the chance of more work coming to the area.
